= IRC =
This space is dedicated to the XWiki IRC Bot application.
== Features ==
The Bot offers the following features: * IRC Notification of modified pages on the wiki where this IRC application is installed * Logging of IRC message in wiki pages * The following IRC Botlet are available:((( {{velocity}} #foreach($item in $xwiki.searchDocuments(", BaseObject as obj where obj.name=doc.fullName and obj.className='IRC.IRCBotlet' order by doc.name")) #set ($itemDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($item)) $itemDoc.use("IRC.IRCBotlet") * [[$item]]: $itemDoc.getValue("description") #end {{/velocity}} )))
== Actions ==
You can [[start or stop the IRC Bot>>IRC.IRCBot]].
== Archives ==
Here are the latest archived logs:
{{velocity}} #foreach($item in $xwiki.searchDocuments("where doc.fullName like 'IRC.%Archive%' and doc.name <> 'IRCArchiveClass' and doc.name <> 'IRCArchiveClassSheet' and doc.name <> 'IRCArchiveClassTemplate' order by doc.date desc", 10, 0)) * [[$item]] #end {{/velocity}}
